full_text:
IN THE COURT OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- ITI
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Sri. Vinod Babu M.U
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class-III
18" day of February, 2025
CG. 30/2024

Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,

Museum Police Station ( Crime 1489/23).
(By Asst. Public Prosecutor)

Accused : Sajeendra Babu, S/o Sahadevan,Sowparnika House, SRL
C-15, Sankar Lane, mear RKD school, Sasthamangalam
ward, Sasthamangalam villagae.

Offences : U/s. 279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code and 185 of
Motor Vehicle Act.

Order : Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of
Rs. 1,000/- for the offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of
Indian Penal Code and 185 of Motor Vehicle Act. In
default of payment of fine the accused _ shall undergo
simple imprisonment for 10 days.

Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
JUDGMENT

1. The accused stands charge sheeted by the Sub Inspector of Police, Museum Police
Station alleging offence U/Ss.279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code and 185 of
Motor Vehicle Act.

2. Accused pleaded guilty . Particulars of offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of Indian
Penal Code and 185 of Motor Vehicle Act was read over and explained to the
accused and he pleaded guilty. This court is convinced that the plea of the
accused is voluntary. Hence his plea is accepted. The accused is found guilty for
the offence U/Ss. 279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code and 185 of Motor

2
Vehicle Act and he is convicted thereunder.

3. Accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of Rs. 1,000/- for the
offence U/S.279,337 and 338 of Indian Penal Code and 185 of Motor
Vehicle Act. In default of payment of fine the accused shall undergo
simple imprisonment for 10 days.

(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 18" day of February, 2025.)

Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- ITI

Thiruvananthapuram
